short_summary: Fabricate, test and deliver steel buoys for Canadian Coast Guard
description: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to fabricate, test, and deliver on one long leg steel buoy and one short leg steel buoy to the Canadian Coast Guard

full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Date Posted: 2022-05-14
#### Tender Closing Date: 2022-07-09 14:00:00 CET
#### Amendment Number: 2
#### Solicitation Number: WS4426195595

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting offers for the fabrication, testing, and delivery of steel buoys to the Canadian Coast Guard. The successful Offeror shall provide:
* 1 long leg steel buoy
* 1 short leg steel buoy

### Tender Requirements
The steel buoys shall meet the following requirements:
* Comply with all applicable laws and regulations of Canada
* Be designed and constructed to withstand the harsh marine environment
* Provide a reliable and safe maritime navigation aid

### Procurement Details
* Procurement Category: Goods (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Deliverables and timelines
Expected Contract Start Date: 2022-06-03
There is no expected contract end date.

### Contact Information
Thomas Leboeuf
Leboeuf, Thomas (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice and Attachment
Please visit the link below for the full tender notice and to access any additional documentation.
[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19698317?extsite=MTk2OTgzMTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19698317?extsite=MTk2OTgzMTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
No attachments are available for this tender.

---

Responsible for the procurement of steel buoys for the Canadian Coast Guard are the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO). The contract will be administered by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services. Please submit your proposals by the tender closing date above.

Note: the project's bid closure date is expired.
